New Records: Aaron Civale and Aaron Ashby combined on a two-hit shutout
Aaron Civale had his longest outing of the season
Aaron Ashby pitched two perfect innings with three strikeouts
Key Match Events: The Brewers scored six runs in the second inning
Post-Match Reflections: Brewers Manager Pat Murphy praised the team's resilience
Giants Manager Bob Melvin noted the team's struggles across all aspects of the game
